description: Detects suspicious sub processes of web server processes
false_positives: Web applications that invoke Linux command line tools
name: Linux Webshell Indicators
query: (process.executable:(*\/whoami OR *\/ifconfig OR *\/usr\/bin\/ip OR *\/bin\/uname) AND (process.parent.executable:(*\/httpd OR *\/lighttpd OR *\/nginx OR *\/apache2 OR *\/node OR *\/caddy) OR (process.parent.command_line:*\/bin\/java* AND process.parent.command_line:*tomcat*)))
author: Florian Roth
